languages.text: "Заткнись уже, Гвоздь", {n}— старуха с недобрыми темными глазами переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Дело такое, Ваша Светлость. Ваши блюстители, чтоб их, нам тут прохода не дают. "Культистов" каких-то ищут. Чуть что — берутся за дубинки. Если хотят наказать кого-то — на неделю откручивают отопление в целых отсеках, так что мы болеем и мерзнем! В моем клане двое ребятишек умерли от воспаления легких, и все из-за этих", {n}— старуха демонстративно плюет на пол и растирает плевок ногой в изношенной обуви.{/n}

"Shut up, Rivet," {n}snaps the old woman, who turns her hostile dark eyes on you.{/n} "Here's the deal, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your damned enforcers are all over us down here. They say they're looking for 'cultists.' One wrong word and they're reaching for their batons. If they want to punish someone — they turn off the heating to whole bays for a week at a time, so we get sick and freeze! In my clan, two little ones died from inflammation in their lungs, all because of those enforcers." {n}The old woman spits on the floor and rubs at the spittle with the toe of her worn-out shoe.{/n}

"Культистов" каких-то ищут. Чуть что — берутся за дубинки. Если хотят наказать кого-то — на неделю откручивают отопление в целых отсеках, так что мы болеем и мерзнем! В моем клане двое ребятишек умерли от воспаления легких, и все из-за этих", {n}— старуха демонстративно плюет на пол и растирает плевок ногой в изношенной обуви.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Shut up, Beanpole," {n}snaps the old woman, who turns her hostile dark eyes on you.{/n} "Here's the deal, Your Grace. Your damned guards are all over us down here. They say they're looking for 'pirates.' One wrong word and they're reaching for their batons. If they want to punish someone — they turn off the heating to whole bays for a week at a time, so we get sick and freeze! In my clan, two little ones died from inflammation in their lungs, all because of those guards." {n}The old woman spits on the floor and rubs at the spittle with the toe of her worn-out shoe.{/n}

languages.text: “闭嘴，尖钉。”{n}老妇人打断了他的话，充满敌意的黑眼睛看着你。{/n}“是这样的，大人。你那群该死的执法者跑到了我们这边，说他们在找什么‘异端分子’。只要我们说错了一句话，他们就会抄起棍子揍我们。要是他们想收拾谁，他们就会关掉整个船舱的供暖，一次关一个星期，我们就会挨冻、生病！我的氏族已经有两个小家伙死于肺炎了，都是因为那些执法者干的好事。”{n}老妇人朝地上啐了口口水，用破鞋的鞋尖擦着。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shut up, Rivet," {n}snaps the old woman, who turns her hostile dark eyes on you.{/n} "Here's the deal, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your damned enforcers are all over us down here. They say they're looking for 'cultists.' One wrong word and they're reaching for their batons. If they want to punish someone — they turn off the heating to whole bays for a week at a time, so we get sick and freeze! In my clan, two little ones died from inflammation in their lungs, all because of those enforcers." {n}The old woman spits on the floor and rubs at the spittle with the toe of her worn-out shoe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “闭嘴，麻杆。”{n}老妇人打断了他的话，充满敌意的黑眼睛看着你。{/n}“是这样的，大人。你那群该死的镇压者跑到了我们这边，说他们在找什么‘海盗’。只要我们说错了一句话，他们就会抄起棍子揍我们。要是他们想收拾谁，他们就会关掉整个船舱的供暖，一次关一个星期，我们就会挨冻、生病！我的氏族已经有两个小家伙死于肺炎了，都是因为那些镇压者干的好事。”{n}老妇人朝地上啐了口口水，用破鞋的鞋尖擦着。{/n}

languages.text: «A callar, Remache». {n}La anciana ladra antes de dirigir sus ojos negros y hostiles hacia ti.{/n} «Así está la cosa, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sus malditos guardias están abusando de nosotros aquí abajo. Dicen que están buscando "cultistas". A la mínima protesta, sacan las porras. Si quieren castigar a alguien, apagan la calefacción de bahías enteras durante una semana, ¡así que nos congelamos y enfermamos! En mi clan, dos niños han muerto por inflamación en los pulmones por culpa de esos guardias». {n}La anciana escupe en el suelo y restriega la saliva con la punta de su zapato desgastado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shut up, Rivet," {n}snaps the old woman, who turns her hostile dark eyes on you.{/n} "Here's the deal, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your damned enforcers are all over us down here. They say they're looking for 'cultists.' One wrong word and they're reaching for their batons. If they want to punish someone — they turn off the heating to whole bays for a week at a time, so we get sick and freeze! In my clan, two little ones died from inflammation in their lungs, all because of those enforcers." {n}The old woman spits on the floor and rubs at the spittle with the toe of her worn-out shoe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «A callar, Larguirucho». {n}La anciana ladra antes de dirigir sus ojos negros y hostiles hacia ti.{/n} «Así está la cosa, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sus malditos guardias están abusando de nosotros aquí abajo. Dicen que están buscando "piratas". A la mínima protesta, sacan las porras. Si quieren castigar a alguien, apagan la calefacción de bahías enteras durante una semana, ¡así que nos congelamos y enfermamos! En mi clan, dos niños han muerto por inflamación en los pulmones por culpa de esos guardias». {n}La anciana escupe en el suelo y restriega la saliva con la punta de su zapato desgastado.{/n}

languages.text: 「黙りな、リベット{n}老女は怒り、敵意のこもった黒い目をあなたに向けた。{/n}「これは取引だよ、陛下。お宅の忌々しいエンフォーサーが、この辺り一帯を取り囲んでいる。連中は『魔女団』とやらを探していると言う。一言でも間違えれば、警棒を振りかざす。誰かを懲らしめるために、一度に1週間もベイ全体の暖房を止めるから、あたしらは病気になって凍えてしまう！あたしの一族では、2人の小さな子供が肺炎で死んだんだ。全部エンフォーサーのせいさ」{n}老女は床に唾を吐くと、履き古した靴のつま先で唾をこすった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shut up, Rivet," {n}snaps the old woman, who turns her hostile dark eyes on you.{/n} "Here's the deal, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your damned enforcers are all over us down here. They say they're looking for 'cultists.' One wrong word and they're reaching for their batons. If they want to punish someone — they turn off the heating to whole bays for a week at a time, so we get sick and freeze! In my clan, two little ones died from inflammation in their lungs, all because of those enforcers." {n}The old woman spits on the floor and rubs at the spittle with the toe of her worn-out shoe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「黙りな、ビーンポール」{n}老女は怒り、敵意のこもった黒い目をあなたに向けた。{/n}「これは取引だよ、閣下。お宅の忌々しいエンフォーサーが、この辺り一帯を取り囲んでいる。連中は『海賊』とやらを探していると言う。一言でも間違えれば、警棒を振りかざす。誰かを懲らしめるために、一度に1週間もベイ全体の暖房を止めるから、あたしらは病気になって凍えてしまう！あたしの一族では、2人の小さな子供が肺炎で死んだんだ。全部エンフォーサーのせいさ」{n}老女は床に唾を吐くと、履き古した靴のつま先で唾をこすった。{/n}

languages.text: "Fresse, Bolzen"{n}, zischt die alte Frau und richtet ihre feindseligen Augen auf dich.{/n} "Es ist so, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Eure verfluchten Enforcers tyrannisieren uns hier unten. Angeblich suchen sie nach 'Kultisten'. Ein falsches Wort von uns reicht und sie zücken ihren Schlagstock. Wenn sie jemanden bestrafen wollen, schalten sie eine ganze Woche lang die Heizung einer gesamten Bucht aus, so dass wir alle frieren und krank werden! In meinem Clan sind zwei Kinder an einer Lungenentzündung gestorben, nur wegen dieser Enforcers." {n}Die alte Frau spuckt zu Boden und verreibt den Speichel mit der Spitze ihres abgewetzten Schuhs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shut up, Rivet," {n}snaps the old woman, who turns her hostile dark eyes on you.{/n} "Here's the deal, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your damned enforcers are all over us down here. They say they're looking for 'cultists.' One wrong word and they're reaching for their batons. If they want to punish someone — they turn off the heating to whole bays for a week at a time, so we get sick and freeze! In my clan, two little ones died from inflammation in their lungs, all because of those enforcers." {n}The old woman spits on the floor and rubs at the spittle with the toe of her worn-out shoe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Fresse, Bohnenstange"{n}, zischt die alte Frau und richtet ihre feindseligen Augen auf dich.{/n} "Es ist so, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Eure verfluchten Enforcers tyrannisieren uns hier unten. Angeblich suchen sie nach 'Piraten'. Ein falsches Wort von uns reicht und sie zücken ihren Schlagstock. Wenn sie jemanden bestrafen wollen, schalten sie eine ganze Woche lang die Heizung einer gesamten Bucht aus, so dass wir alle frieren und krank werden! In meinem Clan sind zwei Kinder an einer Lungenentzündung gestorben, nur wegen dieser Enforcers." {n}Die alte Frau spuckt zu Boden und verreibt den Speichel mit der Spitze ihres abgewetzten Schuhs.{/n}

languages.text: « Boucle-la, Rivet, {n}aboie la vieille femme avant de tourner vers vous un regard noir et agressif.{/n} Notre problème, Votre Seigneurie, c'est que vos fumiers de prévôts nous harcèlent en permanence Sous prétexte que des "cultistes" auraient infiltré nos rangs. Au moindre mot de travers, ils sortent leurs matraques aussi sec. Et quand ils veulent punir quelqu'un, ils coupent le chauffage pendant une semaine dans des compartiments entiers. Résultat, on gèle et on tombe malades ! Rien que dans mon clan, deux gamins sont morts de pneumonie par leur faute. » {n}La vieille crache par terre avant d'étaler la glaire du bout de sa chaussure éculée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shut up, Rivet," {n}snaps the old woman, who turns her hostile dark eyes on you.{/n} "Here's the deal, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your damned enforcers are all over us down here. They say they're looking for 'cultists.' One wrong word and they're reaching for their batons. If they want to punish someone — they turn off the heating to whole bays for a week at a time, so we get sick and freeze! In my clan, two little ones died from inflammation in their lungs, all because of those enforcers." {n}The old woman spits on the floor and rubs at the spittle with the toe of her worn-out shoe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Boucle-la, l'Échalas, {n}aboie la vieille femme avant de tourner vers vous un regard noir et agressif.{/n} Notre problème, Votre Seigneurie, c'est que vos fumiers de prévôts nous harcèlent en permanence sous prétexte que des "pirates" auraient infiltré nos rangs. Au moindre mot de travers, ils sortent leurs matraques aussi sec. Et quand ils veulent punir quelqu'un, ils coupent le chauffage pendant une semaine dans des compartiments entiers. Résultat, on gèle et on tombe malades ! Rien que dans mon clan, deux gamins sont morts de pneumonie par leur faute. » {n}La vieille crache par terre avant d'étaler la glaire du bout de sa chaussure éculée.{/n}

languages.text: "Kapat çeneni Rivet." {n}Yaşlı kadın, cümlesini tamamlayıp hasmane bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, durum şöyle: Kahrolası infazcılarınız bize nefes aldırmıyor. Güya 'tarikatçıları' arıyorlarmış. Yanlış tek sözümüzde coplarına davranıyorlar. Birini cezalandırmak için koca bir bölgenin ısıtmasını bir hafta kadar kapattıkları oluyor. Hastalanıyoruz, donuyoruz yahu! Benim klanımdan iki çocuğu akciğer iltihabından kaybettik. İnfazcılar sağ olsun." {n}Yere tüküren yaşlı kadın, eskimiş ayakkabısının ucuyla tükürüğüne basıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shut up, Rivet," {n}snaps the old woman, who turns her hostile dark eyes on you.{/n} "Here's the deal, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your damned enforcers are all over us down here. They say they're looking for 'cultists.' One wrong word and they're reaching for their batons. If they want to punish someone — they turn off the heating to whole bays for a week at a time, so we get sick and freeze! In my clan, two little ones died from inflammation in their lungs, all because of those enforcers." {n}The old woman spits on the floor and rubs at the spittle with the toe of her worn-out shoe.{/n}

Güya 'tarikatçıları' arıyorlarmış. Yanlış tek sözümüzde coplarına davranıyorlar. Birini cezalandırmak için koca bir bölgenin ısıtmasını bir hafta kadar kapattıkları oluyor. Hastalanıyoruz, donuyoruz yahu! Benim klanımdan iki çocuğu akciğer iltihabından kaybettik. İnfazcılar sağ olsun." {n}Yere tüküren yaşlı kadın, eskimiş ayakkabısının ucuyla tükürüğüne basıyor.{/n}
